errorUrlInvalid: Invalid URL format. Please include http:// or https://
errorMaxItemsReached: Maximum number of items ({maxItems}) reached for this conversation.
errorUrlExists: This URL has already been added to the current conversation.
errorCannotAddAllFiles: Cannot add all files. Maximum number of items ({maxItems}) would be exceeded.
confirmDeleteConversation: Are you sure you want to delete the conversation "{conversationName}"? This action cannot be undone.
addUrlsOrFiles: Add URLs or files to the conversation "{conversationName}" to start querying.
micError: Microphone permission was denied. Please allow microphone access to use this feature.
addMessageToFiles: Add a message to your files...
welcomeMessage: Ready to chat! Add documents to the knowledge base for "{conversationName}" to start asking questions.
newChatCreated: New chat created: "{conversationName}". Add documents to the knowledge base and I'll answer your questions about them.
summaryTooShort: The conversation is too short to summarize.
defaultChatPlaceholder: Add URLs or files to the knowledge base to start chatting.
feedbackQuestion: What was the issue with the response? How could it be improved?
